# Nasiha: Hospital Data 

```{r}
hospital_data =
  read_csv(file = "./data/Hospitals.csv")

facilities_by_borough = 
  hospital_data %>%
  group_by(Borough) %>%
  summarise(Facility_Count = n())

hospitals_by_type = 
  hospital_data %>% 
  group_by(`Facility Type`) %>% 
  summarise(Facility_Count = n())
```
